definition: to prick with a needle/to treat by acupuncture
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder

sentences.english: The production processes of nanosilver antibacterial shoe material were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了納米銀抗菌針刺鞋材的生產過程。

sentences.english: Acupuncture may cause just a little pain, but it also causes a certain feeling of numbness and distension.
sentences.chinese: 針刺只有輕微疼痛，它產生一定的麻和脹感。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of Liyan Ice Bar on bulbar paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察利咽冰棒配合針刺治療球麻痹的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: To observe the effects of needling combined with function training on the balance function of stroke patients.
sentences.chinese: 探討針刺配合功能訓練對腦卒中患者平衡功能的影響。

sentences.english: Afterwards, pecking-acupuncture technique was done on Renzhong (GV 26) to achieve strong stimulation for 10 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 繼續針刺人中，施雀啄手法強刺激10下。

sentences.english: They are made of the needled ceramic fibre blanket.
sentences.chinese: 由陶瓷纖維針刺毯加工而成。

sentences.english: Conclusion Needling with electrical acupuncture has a reliable curative effect on piriform syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 結論針刺配合電針治療梨狀肌綜合徵療效確切。

sentences.english: Objective To find out an effective acupuncture therapy for children allergic rhinitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討美容毫針針刺治療兒童變應性鼻炎的療效。

sentences.english: Object:To explore the methods of acupuncture and acupoint selection to increase the effect of head acupuncture on treatment of cerebral thrombosis hemiplegia.
sentences.chinese: 探討提高頭針治療腦血栓偏癱療效的針刺及取穴方法。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect of blood-letting therapy on acne vulgaris.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察針刺放血治療尋常痤瘡的療效。

sentences.english: This paper reports acupuncture and point injection therapy for lumbago.
sentences.chinese: 本文報導了針刺配穴位注射治療腰腿痛的療法。

sentences.english: The tranquilizing and allaying excitement methods had an advantage than common acupuncture group on treating hemicrania.
sentences.chinese: 鎮靜安神針刺法治療偏頭痛遠期療效優於普通針刺組。

sentences.english: The tranquilizing and allaying excitement methods had an advantage than common acupuncture group on treating hemicrania.
sentences.chinese: 鎮靜安神針刺法治療偏頭痛遠期療效優於普通針刺組。

sentences.english: This construction involves the vertical needling of a fibrous web (batt) onto a woven base fabric.
sentences.chinese: 這個結構涉及的在羊毛打底上的纖維網垂直針刺。

sentences.english: Conclusion Liyan Ice Bar has a sure curative effect on bulbar paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 結論利咽冰棒配合針刺治療球麻痹療效確切。

sentences.english: The effect of acupuncture was observed on 12 nociceptive neurons.
sentences.chinese: 對12個傷害性神經元進行了針刺效應的觀察。

definition: surface of the body/periphery of the body/body thermometer/(literary) a person's appearance
cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
(TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
(TCM) diagnosis based on the patient's pulse/to make such a diagnosis
